reviews.review: Good for those people who want to start playing first person fps shooter.

Золота середина між 1.6 та CS:GO . Раслабуха повна, так що за вечірком те що треба(тільки треба знайти підходящий сервер який сподобається своїм комюніті, тай після декількох зіграних на цьому сервері карт можеш рахувати їх своєю другою сім'єю)

Поиграл я и скажу прямо. Игра гавно, как сама игра, так и её комьюнити. Одни мудаки играют, которые готовы тебя послать и каждый из которых считает, что лучше тебя. Ну афигевшие одним словом. Не советую за такие деньги покупать это. Я вот верну.

Несмотря на серьезные косяки, игра вполне хороша своей графикой, тем более если посмотреть на дату создания игры. Единственный и большой минус это абсолютная ватная стрельба, поэтому говорить о киберспорте просто бессмысленно. Скорее всего source идеальна для зомби модов.

The Counter-Strike i've enjoyed the most in my lifetime. I used to play this back in my club which explains my lack of hours.
It's still worth pickin' up n' checkin' out and is basically an expansion/requirement if you decide to play Gmod.
The game is also a Valve game and is stupidly cheap on sale.

es el mejor juego de la saga counter strike

This's one of the very best re-makes ever made in gaming history. The screen gets widened since the original Counter-Strike 1.6. So if you have a wide screen monitor, you get to see a lot more than you did before; which makes you more aware of a combatant. However, the graphics are much more distorted in how you perceive distance since the original release. I'd actually go as far as saying that; in their own way, the graphics in the original Counter Strike were a bit higher quality. Sure, the stronger video card required, mixed with more modern programmers; have created all of the sprites to be more beautiful in, many ways. But the thoughtfulness of the original release: when it comes to the modulating of the sprites and programming them beautifully; I prefer the original version. I do love the extra weapon in Counter-Strike Source; and if Counter-Strike, version 1.6, ever comes out with a wide-screen version: then I will miss the German, semi-automatic, powerful, sniper rifle. (It can be much more lethal, even though it's not as powerful as the United Kingdom's sniper rifle, because you don't need to fixate the weapon every time you take a shot. The ability to just take 12 consecutive shots from that far of range can usually mean that you're about as strong as the entire enemy team; if they're in a pack.) ((The United Kingdom's sniper rifle is still my favourite, though; because you can shoot through certain wooden objects like doors, killing your enemy. Or you can actually kill at least 2 people with one sniper shot, since it's a magnum & a 50' cal' shot.)) One thing I would add in the game is for their to be different amounts of random chances, for each individual weapon, to jam or backfire. The M16 would backfire more than the AK-47 for instance. Ladies and gentlemen, I give this game 9.5/10 as my rating. (If the graphics and registry were worked on a bit more; I'd give it a 10/10.) Thank you very much for your time, take care, enjoy, and good bye.
ну... Играю с 2005 года. Еще рекомендации нужны?

Counter Strike é um jogo para quem tem banda larga. Não só pelo fato de que para se desfrutá-lo completamente deve ser jogado online, como também pelo fato de seus updates serem grandes e demorados. O servidor da Valve, talvez por fruto do azar, proveu velocidades muito baixas de download, além de pausas inexplicáveis durante a atualização causando aborrecimento logo no início.

(OBS: NÃO DEIXA DE SER UM JOGO ESPETAULAR E, QUE VAI VIVER POR MUITOS ANOS AINDA)
